## Ej. 2

Implemento los estimadores

```{r}
muestra <- c(500, 488, 426, 510, 450, 368, 508, 514, 426, 476, 512, 526, 444, 524, 236)
T1 <- function(x) return(mean(x))
T2 <- function(x) return((-1+sqrt(1+4*mean(x^2)))/2)

lambda_1 <- T1(muestra)
lambda_2 <- T2(muestra)
lambda_1
lambda_2
```

Bootstrapeo y grafico

```{r}
strap_1 <- replicate(1000, rpois(15, T1(lambda_1)))
strap_2 <- replicate(1000, rpois(15, T1(lambda_2)))

hist(strap_1)
hist(strap_2)
```

Estimo varianza

```{r}
sd(strap_1)^2
sd(strap_2)^2
```
